function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of data for all asean member states","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Novelty of the study","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risk of financial default","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex model formulation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Empirical study based on theoretical model","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Complex loan demand equations may lead to incorrect loan assessments and allocations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate equilibrium loan amount calculations may result in under or over-financing of small and medium enterprises smes .","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-optimal credit guarantee ratio determination may increase the risk of loan default and financial losses.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of optimal credit guarantee ratio in the banking industry for sme loans in asean countries during and after covid-19 crisis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Moral hazard resulting from adopting the same credit guarantee ratio for all banks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete modeling of the credit guarantee ratio may lead to suboptimal policy decisions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of appropriate lending technology for credit-rationed smes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High cost of borrowing for smes in developing nations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Credit constraints affecting smes’ employment and operations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Logistics disruptions in the short run","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Structural challenges in the long run","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise in cash flow risk for smes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of academic study on the impact of covid-19 on asean economies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on smes in asean countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpreparedness of smes to face disruptions caused by covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to the close physical proximity of individuals within the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to finance for smes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals in smes can lead to the rapid spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear legal basis for pseudonymization conversions","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data governance and quality control","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of interoperability in cross-border exchange of electronic health data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential lack of standardised data collection methods","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal resource reliance in federated approaches","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to directly interact and view data in federated systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of local support for risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stringent local legal and ethical requirements hindering timely research in public health threats","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and harmonization in covid-19 patient cohorts","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sensitive participant-level clinical data usage and privacy concerns","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of interoperability between community-developed data standards","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Classical format of research funding is slow and may not generate evidence and knowledge fast enough in dynamic situations like a pandemic.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Competitive nature of funding calls overlooks certain eu regions, leading to limited participation from those areas.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standard wording for broad informed consent may hinder data sharing and collaboration in research projects.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Knowledge scouting activities are not included, leading to delayed evidence production and limited confirmation of scientific importance.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of data breaches in centralised data repositories leading to unauthorized access and use of sensitive information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of privacy breaches and data misuse in federated data analysis and machine learning due to lack of standardized security measures across local nodes.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adopting a centralised infrastructure for data management","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ethical considerations in accessing patient records","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized reporting for cohort data and international code linkage","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of data from large-scale cohort data sets across europe","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enrollment of over 1,300,000 individuals in the orchestra cohort","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly documented process of harmonising and integrating data from existing projects","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for future strategies for largescale harmonisation of
